Class RegisterController

java.lang.Object
com.ceng453.game.controller.RegisterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
@Component public class RegisterController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for Register page, implements Initializable, make it component

    • onClickRegister

      public void onClickRegister​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is called when sign up button is pressed. If username, email or password field is empty, it shows an error message in snackbar. Otherwise, it makes a post request to API. If user successfully registered, it navigated through the login page. Otherwise it shows an error message in snackbar.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - for FXMLLoader

    • onClickRegisterToLogin

      public void onClickRegisterToLogin​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is called when login hyperlink on register page is clicked. It loads login page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException
